mapper.select: SELECT brd_key, brd_title, brd_writer, brd_wt_time, brd_lookup, brd_content FROM board WHERE del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( brd_writer, brd_password, brd_title, brd_content ) VALUES ( #{brdWriter}, #{brdPassword}, #{brdTitle}, #{brdContent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET brd_writer = #{brdWriter}, brd_password = #{brdPassword}, brd_title = #{brdTitle}, brd_content = #{brdContent}, brd_md_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE brd_key = #{brdKey}
